ud3.6:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
ud3.6:1.3: Now at that time Venerable Pilindavaccha called the mendicants wretches.
ud3.6:1.4: Then several mendicants went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him,
